note:
This is the place for discussing the potential collapse of modern civilization and the environment.

Collapse, in this context, refers to the significant loss of an established level or complexity towards a much simpler state. It can occur differently within many areas, orderly or chaotically, and be willing or unwilling. It does not necessarily imply human extinction or a singular, global event. Although, the longer the duration, the more it resembles a ‘decline’ instead of collapse.

RULES

1 - Remember the human

2 - Link posts should come from a reputable source

3 - All opinions are allowed but discussion must be in good faith.

4 - No low effort, high volume and low relevance posts.

Related lemmys:

  • /c/green
  • /c/antreefa
  • /c/gardening

  • /c/eco_socialism@lemmygrad.ml

Mostly here to read interesting things, get news and chat with friends.
Father, Husband, Democrat, Cannabis User, Deadhead/All things Weir, Baseball Fan, former construction project manager, former environmental reporter who created GreenEarthLive.com
Imperfect environmentalist. Believes in moral courage and cultural pluralism. Interested in EVs (+ bikes), renewables and passive houses.

Resident of Scotland. Cares about and for the Environment (esp. the wet bit). Trying not to hate; but deeply offended by right-wing idiotology and the stupidity of Brexit. Je me reste un citoyen Européen. We need a worldview that's wider than money; because living on this planet means we're part of a complex system of relationships that supports all life - not just H. sap.

Also: I have a bus pass and I'm not afraid to use it! (We get them early in Scotland...) 😉

Devon, UK, Europe

He/him.

An intrepid explorer, navigating the often hostile lands of consumerism, to find the least awful options among vast swathes of unsustainable products and services that we use on a daily basis.
Come with me on a journey of discovery, for #sustainable #green #eco-friendly choices in a landscape of green washed, carbon offset pitfalls.
As we know, there is no ethical consumption under capitalism, but we sure can try!

🇪🇺#Toriesareout, #notocorruption, #vegan=loving any animal,Politically left-of-centre. #Pro-EU (#Brexit criminal). Happy to pay taxes for the benefit of everyone.
